body: fucking love it. would like people to read it aswell
You made a new tag for conjoined? But can't make one for ones we need!
Reupload indeed, but still good too see it again. Such an amazing story everyone deserves to read.
This is highly underrated and true, guro tag is unnecessary. Also a story arc tag!
This doesn't need the guro tag tbh. And @L0lic0nwizard is right. Why the sudden reupload?
I just read an older upload of this exact same hentai on here the other day  ➡️ 137322 ⬅️ Why re-upload it i wonder?

Yo what the fuck. I didn't come here to feel! What an amazingly fucked up but very insightful story about prejudice and hate. It's nothing in light of the true cruelty and hate of old japan tho. A history as deep with the darkness of discrimination as the europeans and/or westerners that mistreated them.
cool story and all but why is this here tho
Let's go .
Don't have the courage to read this

this is probably one of ohkoshi's finest works, its a touching story, with a brilliant commentary on japan's treatment towards the physically and developmentally disabled. im only knocking points off of it because it ends on a cliffhanger and now i wont know if my beans will get the happy end they deserve.
This is a great read, if only a part II existed

fascinating read.
waiting for next part
Those poor freaks. Reminded me of the third act of Nightbreed being attacked by the locals. Slug girl was hot.
This is part 1? Damn it's interesting
I feel like I just read something very real and sad.

fav for later read .
20 pages in and the characters are interesting

I wonder what will happen to the conjoined twins, will they be able to reach Tokyo and meet with their older sister? Is the doctor, the one that is their father's friend still alive? Will he be able to separate sucesfully the twins without sacrificing the life of the other? I think I'll check out the other works of the author. I'm grateful to the translator and the uploader for sharing this manga with us. ^^
I was looking for porn, but I found gold

A manga that is in many ways a antithesis to "Shōjo Tsubaki | Mr. Arashi's Amazing Freak Show". Yes, it has it's horrors and many people (like Hakudami) are quite troublesome, still they often have some understandable reasons to act the way they do. But they're never just demonised, fetish freaks who torture and rape a little girl just for the lols.
What an absolute beautiful story. This manga deserves more than this. This needs to be an anime

Hakudami, you're really good guy
I'm hoping they found their sister in Tokyo and live happily ever after
Wow this is freaking gold
Wow. This story is actually quite interesting. But not many people will appreciate it. Hopefully I can see the continuation of it and see the siblings get their happiness
